name: autoproject-playwright
description: Automated testing with Playwright and TypeScript

scripts.test:dev-staging:with-storage: cross-env ENV=dev-staging QASE_MODE=testops QASE_TESTOPS_API_HOST=qase.io QASE_CAPTURE_LOGS=false npx playwright test --project=with-storage
scripts.test:dev-staging:no-storage: cross-env ENV=dev-staging QASE_MODE=testops QASE_TESTOPS_API_HOST=qase.io QASE_CAPTURE_LOGS=false npx playwright test --project=no-storage
scripts.test:dev-staging:qase: cross-env ENV=dev-staging QASE_MODE=testops QASE_TESTOPS_API_HOST=qase.io QASE_CAPTURE_LOGS=false npx playwright test --project=with-storage
scripts.test:dev-staging:headed: cross-env ENV=dev-staging QASE_MODE=report QASE_TESTOPS_API_HOST=qase.io USER_TYPE=adminsalesforse ASE_CAPTURE_LOGS=false npx playwright test --project=with-storage --headed
scripts.test:dev-staging:local: cross-env ENV=dev-staging QASE_MODE=testops QASE_TESTOPS_API_HOST=qase.io QASE_CAPTURE_LOGS=true npx playwright test --project=with-storage
scripts.test:preprod:qase: cross-env ENV=pre-prod QASE_MODE=testops QASE_TESTOPS_API_HOST=qase.io QASE_CAPTURE_LOGS=true npx playwright test --project=with-storage
scripts.test:regression:qase: cross-env ENV=dev-staging QASE_MODE=testops QASE_TESTOPS_API_HOST=qase.io QASE_CAPTURE_LOGS=false npx playwright test --project=with-storage --grep @Regression --headless=false
